com.amfontai.cmput301asn1

Class NoteDetail

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.amfontai.cmput301asn1.NoteDetail

  • public class NoteDetail
extends Activity
    The Class NoteDetail represents a create/edit/delete window for Note. It sends the note to the NotesDb to be saved, or the ID of the note to be deleted.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NoteDetail.DatePickerFragment
      The Class DatePickerFragment brings up an android DatePickerDialog

      the SQLiteDatabase ID of the Note instance.
      private Note mNote
      An instance of Note that The activity shows.

    • Field Detail

      • mDb

        private NotesDb mDb
        mDb is an instance of (@link NotesDb}, which controls access to the SQLiteDatabase.

      • mId

        private int mId
        the SQLiteDatabase ID of the Note instance. -1 if the note is new.

      • mNote

        private Note mNote
        An instance of Note that The activity shows.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        On creation of the note, the Activity gets the ndroid.content.Intent passed to it by the parent window and looks for an mId number to seach NotesDb for. If there is no ID in the intent, the ID defaults to -1, and the entries are filled with the default: Subject: Blank, Date: The current date, Content: Blank
        See Also:
        android.app.Activity#onCreate(android.os.Bundle)

        public void saveNote()
